instruction.en:
Press and hold the pair button of the relay with a small pin until the LED starts blinking.

Note: it can take 10 seconds before pairing starts after releasing the button, if the device does not pair within 15-20 seconds please try again.
instruction.fr: Maintenez appuyé le bouton d'appairage pendant 10 secondes jusqu'à ce que la lumière clignotte.
